quotes.quote: I will sacrifice whatever is necessary to be the best.
To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
If you ever lack the motivation to train then think what happens to your minds and body when you don't.
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
It is a shame for a woman to grow old without ever seeing the strength and beauty of which her body is capable.
A fit, healthy bodyâ€”that is the best fashion statement.
You shall gain, but you shall pay with sweat, blood, and vomit.
The reason fat men are good natured is they can neither fight nor run.
Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
A bear, however hard he tries, grows tubby without exercise.
The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion.
There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
Energy and persistence conquer all things.

If you keep on eating unhealthy food than no matter how many weight loss tips you follow, you are likely to retain weight and become obese. If only you start eating healthy food, you will be pleasantly surprised how easy it is to lose weight.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
Becoming healthy is the best decision I have ever made.
The real workout starts when you want to stop.
We don't stop exercising because we grow old. We grow old because we stop exercising.
Getting fit is all about mind over matter. I don't mind, so it doesn't matter.
Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
For me, exercise is more than just physical â€“ it's therapeutic.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible.
